mapper.select: SELECT chatting_room_name chattingRoomName , chatting_no chattingNo , chatting_memo chattingMemo , DATE_FORMAT(createdate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') createdate , from_id fromId FROM chatting WHERE chatting_room_name = #{chattingRoomName}

SELECT c.chatting_room_name chattingRoomName , c.chatting_memo chattingMemo , c.from_id fromId , cr.updatedate updatedate FROM chatting c INNER JOIN chatting_room cr ON cr.chatting_room_name = c.chatting_room_name WHERE (c.chatting_room_name, c.createdate) IN( SELECT chatting_room_name, MAX(createdate) createdate FROM chatting GROUP BY chatting_room_name ) ORDER BY c.chatting_room_name desc
